author: remm
msg: - Log to the token instead of the Domain.
- Fix lifecycle problems when used in the standalone server, where the servlet
would attempt to shutdown the domain. Now, it won't attempt to if it didn't

author: remm
msg: - Cleanup the lifecycle code (no need to recreate any loggers on stop).

author: msmith
msg: Go back to url encoding, and change url decoding, to use the URLUtil class,
so as to avoid being completely broken.
This appears to not work (at least with MS products) for non-ASCII characters,
but the current code didn't even work for all ASCII characters, so this is
